title: What would you recommend more to a student, a computer, a smartphone, a tablet, or a laptop? - Quora

response.answer_text: What would you recommend more to a student, a computer, a smartphone, a tablet, or a laptop? A Windows-based laptop. That will make it most compatible with other systems. Make sure it has a 5GHz WiFi radio built in. “Supports 802.11ac” is *not* sufficient. Make sure it has USB and/or VGA video output, *not* a “displayport”. Make sure it has at least one USB 3.0 or better port. That will allow you to attach all sort of peripherals. Thereafter, get the most CPU, RAM, and HD you can afford. A “docking station” would be nice, to make it real easy to add a full sized keyboard, mouse, and display when your’re at home.

A desktop is for simulation (research), gaming, or graphics/document design with the big screen. A smartphone is for communication, and not recommended for doing school. A tablet can be used in conjunction with the cloud. It is good for videoconferencing. A laptop is the usual choice for its versatility. As a (former) physics lecturer, I do not recommend a laptop for taking notes. Until the interface for making diagrams is seamless, it’s not as good as pencil and paper. I am interested in the Surface computers, but I have not given them a test drive.

In today’s world, a laptop. A tablet or phone are inadequate as working tools, and a laptop has the power and screen size to work, as well as having plenty of capability to run software that students will need. Most students will have a cell phone anyway, but they will need a laptop. If they need a second screen, a monitor can be connected to run in dual-screen mode.

An Laptop. Learn/ Research, Type a doc, store any format. An Laptop is mobile as a tablet. if ur studying programmer/designing/physics Laptops help you a lot. Tablet is good for learning video tutorials, read books etc. Smartphone can do some but looses you attention to other stuff.
A laptop with good battery capacity and reasonable performance would be best. If the hardware is too good,the battery will suffer
